A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: At best you can say this movie is \"entertaining\"\, and casual Star Wars fans will likely agree it's not a good \"Star Wars\" movie which is essential here because this movie is a massive shift in the Star Wars trilogies - that's certainly why it's so divisive. But nearly all hardcore Star Wars fans I spoke to agree that it's not a good shift. In fact\, it's downright awful. This is beside the fact that if we were to remove the plotline and characters of this film and place them in an alternate universe\, it would not fare well. It certainly doesn't fare well as a sci-fi film with a nonchalant treatment of physical reality to fit the plot-line\, not even in ways that fit the original IP or how it's been developed. It's too late for people to not support this film\, it's already paid for itself\, but hopefully the backlash will come for Episode 9.
